body:
As a developer I want to reduce the number of open issues, so that the ones that are active or being worked on will be more visible.

#### Description
As of now we have  1100 open issues and 337 open pull requests. Using a cron job to mark stale issues and eventually close them after a grace period might be a way to keep the two lists more manageable. 

The configuration values I pushed here are of course subject to discussion. The current configuration is:
-  issues that are marked with certain labels are exempted from the check 
-  if an issue is marked as stale anybody has 30 days to perform any activity on it (in which case it will be unmarked)
title: Use a bot to mark stale issues
